pageContext.claim: “First, we will begin to revive and expand our nuclear energy sector, which I'm so happy about, which produces clean, renewable and emissions-free energy.”
pageContext.analysis: It's up for debate whether nuclear energy should be considered clean and renewable. While it doesn't produce greenhouse gases or lead to smog, the waste that is created persists for hundreds of thousands of years. Even if the Earth's supply of urnaium will last a long time, {the raw fuel that powers the reactors is derived from uranium ore, which is a mineral of finate quality on Earth.}
